ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: "Shouldn't you be playing Manasong!"
ygData.msgSnippet: heh, my friends usually ask why i have weapons equipped.
ygData.messageBody:
heh, my friends usually ask why i have weapons equipped.

At 02:57 PM 2/20/01 -0600, you wrote:
>My favorite are the number of 50+ (even 55+) players who asked why I don't
>have my weapons equipped when I doing instruments...
>
>Slyde
>-----Original Message-----
>From: beatdropbattledrum@... [mailto:beatdropbattledrum@...]
>Sent: Tuesday, February 20, 2001 2:26 PM
>To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: [eqbards] Re: "Shouldn't you be playing Manasong!"
>
> > a bit. I think that the general populace is probably pretty
>ignorant about
> > what abilities bards do and do not have.
> >
> > Halana, 59th Shaman
> > Tani, 45th Bard
> > Solusek Ro
>
>
>You hit it right on the head Tani. How many times do you hear people
>say, "Oh, I didn't know bards could do that!" I don't know about you
>all, but I hear that quite a bit. And it doesn't surprise me that
>usually, those are the people that say play mana song during the
>fights!
>
>
>
>
>
>Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@... with the subject submissions.
